title: Justin Martyr - Church Fathers Dialogue with Sam and Hank
description:
Hank and Sam are starting a series of dialogues discussing the Early Church Fathers. The first Church Father that we are discussing in Justin Martyr. We talking about his life, his writings, his beliefs, church community, his faults, and what he means for Christians today. Hank Kruse is coming at this as a recent convert to Catholicism from Protestantism and Sam is coming at this from the perspective of a Biblical Unitarian. We also mention Plato, Socrates, the Stoics, Pythagoras, Gnosticism, the Apostle Paul, Paul Vanderklay, Jordan Peterson, Sam Harris, Jonathan Pageau, Brett Salkeld, Ulrich Zwingli, Thomas Aquinas, Augustine, Martin Luther, John Calvin, Jacob Faturechi, Irenaeus of Lyon, Arius, Luke Thompson, and more. 

Anchor Podcasts: https://anchor.fm/transfigured-sam
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/30q4W2esWfIwiUQMcABD4y
Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/transfigured/id1559094234

00:00:00 - Introduction 
00:01:50 - Background on Justin Martyr
00:07:30 - Justin, Philosophy, and Christianity
00:11:50 - Free will, theodicy, and evil
00:15:30 - The seeds of the logos and general revelation
00:20:50 - Accusations against Christians
00:23:00 - On the eucharist
00:38:40 - The Dialogue with Trypho
00:41:00 - His views on scripture
00:48:00 - His view of God
00:55:00 - His view of Jesus
01:10:35 - What does Justin Martyr get wrong
01:16:20 - Concluding Remarks
